name: 1.1 - Rock Armour, 2 tonne rock class (D0.7m to 1.5m)
Specification/Drawings Reference - Hicks Bay SH35 Slip Repair-1253342-Q002
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Supplier material test certificate

Conformance Criteria - Rock armour shall be hard, durable, quarried or natural stone free from dust, clay, organic matter and other deleterious material. Shall have a D700 to 1500 with a minimum specific Gravity SG of 2350kg/m3.
Records - Material source test results, Delivery dockets
Specification/Drawings Reference - Hicks Bay SH35 Slip Repair-12533432-G002
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Supplier material test certificate

Conformance Criteria - Shall be free draining, hard, durable, well graded, crushed granular material such as AP65 with a fines content <5% with more than 2 broken faces. It shall be free from organic and vegetative material and compacted to achieve 90%MDD. Compaction maybe checked by clegg hammer.
Records - Material source test results, Delivery dockets
Specification/Drawings Reference - Hicks Bay SH35 Slip Repair-12533432-G002
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Laboratory Test Results

Conformance Criteria - Address of the source quarry. The geological description of the parent material. Particle Size Distribution (PSD) Test, Compaction Test and Broken Face Percentage Test Results from a Representative, General Fill Sample Tested in an independent and accredited Laboratory
Specification/Drawings Reference - Hicks Bay SH35 Slip Repair-12533432-G002
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Laboratory Test Results

Conformance Criteria - Results of Compaction Tests as Specified in NZS 4402:1988 - Test 4.1.1 or Test 4.1.3 are to be carried out on the proposed backfill and the results presented to the engineer for agreement prior to construction. These are to clearly show the Optimum Moisture Content and Maximum Dry Density Achieved

2.7 - Rock Armour (700 to 1500dia) placed on the toe of the slope
Specification/Drawings Reference - Hicks Bay SH35 Slip Repair-12533432-Q002
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection

Conformance Criteria - 2t rock class 700 to 1500mm to be placed in toe and on benches to form revetment. Rock to be placed individually not dumped. Slope of the top face of each rock back towards the rockery/ revetment at an inclination of 5%. Any voids larger than 300mm shall be clinched with smaller rock and or infilled with granular aggregate (smaller rock).
